entry.title: New release for Astroluma: Astroluma v1.0.1
entry.content:
Changelog for Astroluma v1.0.1

Enhancements and Fixes:

  • Stream Hub: Resolved mixed content issues. Stream Hub now fully supports SSL.

  • TOTP: - Added double-click functionality to copy TOTP codes. - Fixed scrolling issue with TOTP display.

  • Icon Pack Support: Introduced icon pack functionality with selfh.st as the default icon provider.
  • Folder Management: Redesigned the process for moving links and folders between directories.
  • Featured Tag: Added a "featured" tag to highlight specific listings.
  • User Interface: Applied various UI improvements across the platform.
  • Security: Apps now run within a sandboxed environment for enhanced security.
  • Docker Compose: Introduced alternate configuration options in docker-compose.yml. Credit: HighPriest

Astroluma Portal Updates:

  • Custom Docker Compose: Added an Astroluma Compose tool for generating tailored docker-compose.yml files based on user requirements.

New Portal Features:

  • Added sections for credits, FAQs, screenshots, icon packs, and contact information.
